abstract: Comparing the dangerous effects of three diseases with the minimal side effects of their corresponding vaccines.
lead_paragraph: Vaccines prevent diseases, and being unvaccinated carries a risk. Last year, the World Health Organization ranked vaccine hesitancy, a “reluctance or refusal to vaccinate despite the availability of vaccines,” among the top 10 health threats worldwide, alongside Ebola, H.I.V. and drug-resistant infections.
keywords: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
